name: A Maze Full of Coins (and Also Demons)
name_original: A Maze Full of Coins (and Also Demons)
description:
Enter the maze and collect all of the coins, but try not to get stunned and robbed by greedy creatures.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Move

Shift - Sprint

M - Mute

R- Restart

Esc - Quit

Sounds: Bfxr

Music: Soundation

Pallete: Endesga 16 Palette

Submission for Fragment Jam.
